1.question: How do I configure my v2ray client?
1.answer: After installing your client, you can import your configuration either by pasting the VLESS/VMESS link or by scanning the QR code from your account dashboard.

2.question: Which client should I use?
2.answer: We recommend v2rayN for Windows, V2rayU for Mac, Qv2ray for Linux, v2rayNG for Android, and Shadowrocket for iOS. You can download these from our download page.

3.question: Why is my connection slow?
3.answer: Try selecting a server closer to your location, or switch between different protocols (VLESS/VMESS). Also ensure your client is up to date.

4.question: How do I update my subscription?
4.answer: In your v2ray client, find the subscription management section and click the update/refresh button. This will fetch the latest configuration.

5.question: What if I can't connect?
5.answer: First check if your configuration is current, try different servers, and ensure your client is updated. If issues persist, contact our support team.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - Our Commitment to Your Privacy
metadata.description: Learn about our strict privacy policy and how we protect your data using v2ray technology.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and personal data.

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.description:
We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. Our service is built on the principle that your online activities should remain private and secure.

Using v2ray technology, we ensure that your connection is encrypted and your data remains confidential at all times.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.description:
We maintain a strict no-logs policy. This means we do not collect or store:

• Your browsing history
• Traffic destination or content
• DNS queries
• IP addresses
• Connection timestamps
• Session duration

The only information we collect is what's necessary to maintain your account and provide our service.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.description:
For account functionality, we store only:

• Your email address
• Encrypted account credentials
• Subscription status

All v2ray configuration data is encrypted and stored securely.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.description:
You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time. Upon deletion:

• All account information is permanently removed
• V2ray configurations are immediately deleted
• Subscription data is purged from our systems

security.title: Security Measures
security.description:
We implement robust security measures including:

• End-to-end encryption using v2ray protocols (VLESS/VMESS)
• Regular security audits
• Secure server infrastructure
• Protected configuration storage

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description:
We are committed to transparency regarding:

• Our privacy practices
• Security measures
• Data handling procedures
• Law enforcement policies

We will notify users of any changes to this privacy policy.

contact.title: Privacy Concerns?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or data handling practices, please contact our privacy team.

metadata.title: Terms of Service - Usage Terms & Conditions
metadata.description: Read our terms of service and usage conditions for our v2ray VPN service.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

agreement.title: Service Agreement
agreement.description:
By using our v2ray VPN service, you agree to these terms and conditions:

• You must be at least 18 years old
• You are responsible for maintaining account security
• You agree to provide accurate account information
• You accept our privacy policy and data handling practices

acceptable.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable.description:
Our service may be used for:

• Protecting your online privacy
• Securing your internet connection
• Accessing geo-restricted content legally
• Personal and business use within legal bounds

All usage must comply with applicable laws and regulations.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.description:
The following activities are strictly prohibited:

• Any illegal activities
• Sharing or reselling your account
• Attempting to breach or bypass our security
• Interfering with our service or servers
• Violating third-party rights or terms
• Automated or systematic data collection

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description:
Users must comply with all applicable laws:

• Local internet and privacy laws
• Data protection regulations
• Export control restrictions
• Intellectual property rights

We reserve the right to cooperate with legal authorities when required.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.description:
We may suspend or terminate accounts for:

• Violation of these terms
• Suspicious or abusive activity
• Non-payment or payment disputes
• Legal compliance requirements

Users may terminate their account at any time by contacting support.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description:
We may update these terms:

• With prior notice to users
• For legal compliance
• To reflect service changes
• To improve clarity

Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our terms of service, please contact our legal team.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy - How We Use Cookies
metadata.description: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.

hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.description: Understanding how we use cookies to improve your experience.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.description:
Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us:

• Remember your preferences
• Understand how you use our service
• Improve your browsing experience
• Keep your account secure

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description:
These cookies are required for our service to function properly:

• Authentication cookies
• Security tokens
• Session management
• Load balancing

These cookies cannot be disabled as they are essential for the service.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description:
These cookies enable enhanced functionality:

• Language preferences
• Theme settings
• Server selection memory
• Connection preferences

You can choose to disable these, but some features may not work properly.

control.title: Cookie Control
control.description:
You can manage cookies through:

• Browser settings
• Our cookie preferences center
• Third-party opt-out tools

Instructions for managing cookies vary by browser and device.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description:
We use limited third-party services for:

• Payment processing
• Analytics (anonymized)
• Security monitoring

These services may use their own cookies, which are governed by their respective policies.

duration.title: Cookie Duration
duration.description:
Our cookies have different expiration periods:

• Session cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
• Persistent cookies: Last up to 12 months
• Authentication cookies: Expire after logout

You can manually clear cookies at any time through your browser settings.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact our privacy team.

metadata.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
metadata.description: Find answers to common questions about our v2ray VPN service, setup, and features.

hero.title: How Can We Help?
hero.description: Find answers in our documentation or contact our support team.

1.question: What is v2ray VPN?
1.answer:
V2ray VPN is a modern protocol for secure and private internet access. It provides:

• Enhanced privacy and security
• Better performance than traditional VPNs
• Advanced traffic routing
• Resistance to blocking

2.question: How does v2ray differ from traditional VPN?
2.answer:
V2ray offers several advantages over traditional VPNs:

• More sophisticated encryption methods
• Better ability to bypass restrictions
• Multiple protocol support (VLESS/VMESS)
• Lower latency and higher speeds
• More flexible routing options

3.question: Is the service legal to use?
3.answer:
Yes, our service is legal in most countries. However, you are responsible for:

• Complying with local laws
• Using the service ethically
• Not engaging in illegal activities

Check your local regulations if unsure.

1.question: How do I set up the VPN?
1.answer:
Setting up our VPN is simple:

1. Download our client app
2. Log in with your account
3. Choose a server location
4. Connect with one click

Detailed setup guides are available in our documentation.

2.question: Which protocols do you support?
2.answer:
We support the latest v2ray protocols:

• VLESS - Newer, more efficient protocol
• VMESS - Established, reliable protocol

Both protocols offer excellent security and performance.

3.question: Why is my connection slow?
3.answer:
Try these steps to improve speed:

• Select a closer server
• Switch between protocols (VLESS/VMESS)
• Check your base internet speed
• Update your client

Contact support if issues persist.

1.question: How many devices can I connect?
1.answer:
Our service allows:

• Up to 6 devices simultaneously
• Any combination of devices
• Easy device management
• Quick connection switching

2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
2.answer:
To cancel your subscription:

1. Log into your account
2. Go to Subscription settings
3. Click 'Cancel Subscription'
4. Follow the prompts

You'll maintain access until the current period ends.

3.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
3.answer:
Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee:

• No questions asked
• Full refund if unsatisfied
• Easy cancellation process
• Quick refund processing
